price: 13 Ce Jour-là, ils seront vers la Géhenne violemment poussés.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
